title: E2 formality via obstruction theory
abstract:
We attack the question of E_2-formality of differential graded algebras over
prime fields via obstruction theory. We are able to prove that E_2-algebras
whose cohomology ring is a polynomial algebra on even degree classes are
intrinsically formal. As a consequence we prove E_2-formality of the
classifying space of some compact Lie group or of Davis-Januszkiewicz spaces.
